data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Qina, Egypt need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Qina, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 131,626 believers in Qina to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 2,827,574 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, help the 131,626 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,827,574 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,959,200 people living in Qina.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Arab, Sudanese people might believe through him.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Qina, Egypt a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Qina to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Qina, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

location.name: Qina
location.people_groups_list: Bedouin, Levantine, Abaza, Chechen, Beja, Bedawi, Adyghe
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bedouin, Levantine (124,000), Abaza (14,000), Chechen (6,000), Beja, Bedawi (80,000), Adyghe (14,000)
